name: Lorekheim Rise of a Fallen World 2022
name_original: Lorekheim Rise of a Fallen World 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Bring balance to the City of Lorekheim by cleansing a powerful Antagonist from its corruption.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players : 1
Genre : 3rd Person Action Adventure

This game is only played with a gamepad.

Tech Artist : Corentin ARNAUD
Character / Concept / Texture / Rigging / VFX / Animator - Tech Animator : Joanna BENDAOUD
Environment / Lighting / Texture / Concept Artist : Dorian DUROYAUME
Game & Level Designer - Rational Game Design - VFX Artist : Idris GHALEB
Level & Game Designer : Lucas KOSMALSKI
Game / Level / UX / Graphic / Rationnal & Sound Designer - Scripter : Romain MIGLIO
Game Designer - Scripter - Boss Designer & Behaviour Scripter : Keryan RIGAL
Game System - 3C & Boss Designer / Scripter : Xavier ROUYER
